Mashup.description: This is a custom mashup to fetch sales orders with pagination. This mashup adds the sales order document type to the input. If OrderHoldType element is present in the input,Status, StatusQryType and CallingOrganizationCode attributes are added to OrderHoldType element. If the HoldType is at the orderline level and if OrderLine element is present in the input, OrderHoldType element will be added to the OrderLine element.
This mashup is invoked when we change Order

This mahup is called while loading resolve holds page. The mashup internally calls getCompleteOrderDetails API to fetch the order header status modification permissions and based on the value returned the screen enables or disables few controls.

This mahup is called while loading resolve holds page. The mashup internally calls getCompleteOrderDetails API to fetch the order header status modification permissions and based on the value returned the screen enables or disables few controls.
This mashup is invoked to resolve the holds applied on Order and Order Line level
This mashup is used to fetch retun header information to paint a returns tab on exchange order summary screen-defect 444405, as getOrderDetails is performance intensive, calling getorderlist

This mashup extends SCCSAddSalesOrderDocumentTypeMashup mashup class and it massages the input to add the appropriate DocumentType to the input. If OrderHoldType is present in the input, appropriate Status and StatusQryType, CallingOrganizationCode attributes are added to the OrderHoldType element. Also, if the hold type is ORDER_LINE, then the order line element is added in the OrderHoldType element. Additionally, it removes the DocumentType attribute from the input if OrderNo attribute is present in the input. This mashup is invoked in the Order Potrtlet when Find Order action is performed
Get List of Organizations applicable for current user
Get List of Organizations applicable for current user
Get List of Organizations applicable for current user
This mashup is used to get QueryTypes in User search screen
This is a paginated mashup which is used to get the list of Users for the search criteria and populate the results grid

This mashup extends SCCSOrderByAPIMashup mashup class and it massages the input to add the appropriate DocumentType to the input. If OrderHoldType is present in the input, appropriate Status and StatusQryType, CallingOrganizationCode attributes are added to the OrderHoldType element. Also, if the hold type is ORDER_LINE, then the order line element is added in the OrderHoldType element
Gets the Default value to determine if the question based search is displayed
This mashup is used to determine if Exchange Type is exposed
Gets the Default value to determine the first page of Create Order flow
Gets the Default value to show customer search in Create Order flow
This mashup is called massage the input of getCompleteOrderDetails.The input of the API is modified to pass the ExchangeOrderKey by parsing through the input.
This mashup is to fetch the RULE_NAME rule details for the enterprise.
This mashup is called to get the number of Lines in the order to validate if its a large order
Gets the CustomerID and Orderlines of the order for CreateOrderShowAddressrule
Gets the ShipTo and BillTo address of the order
Update the order with the billing and shipping address
This mashup is used to get the PersonInfoBillTo element for the order and all the order lines.
This mashup is used to get the PersonInfoBillTo element for the order and all the order lines.
This mashup is used to get the PersonInfoShipTo element for the order and all the order lines.
This mashup is used to get the PersonInfoShipTo element for the order and all the order lines.
Gets the Distinct ShipTo of the orderlines in the order
Gets the PersonInfo for the key passed
Gets the PersonInfo for the key passed
This mashup get all the addresses from the order/line and the additional addresses of the customer. Base API used for this is getCompleteOrderlineList
Gets the BillToID CustomerContactID of the Order
Gets the additional addresses of the customer/ contact

This mashup class massages the input of the modifyFulfillmentOptions for updating the order and the orderlines with the changed addresses. The orderlines are fetched for the changed addresses and they are updated.

This mashup class massages the input of the modifyFulfillmentOptions for updating the order and the orderlines with the changed addresses. The orderlines are fetched for the changed addresses and they are updated.
This mashup is used for updating the order Bill To if the same was changed on Payment Method and user wanted to copy it to Order.
Gets the orderlines in the order with the given ShipToKey
Copies the ShipToKey of the header to the lines with no ShipTo

This mashup gets the complete order details ,and based on the no of person info elements coming in the output, HasMultipleAddresses attribute is populated to yes or no. This is used in address display screen to show information that there are multiple addresses of type personInfoShipTo.
Get the Order Details applicable for the provided order.
Determine if there are Alerts associated to the provided order.
This custom mashup modifies the api output by returning all the child elements of DistinctOrderLineList.
This custom mashup modifies the api output by returning all the child elements of DistinctOrderLineList.
This custom mashup modifies the api output by returning all the child elements of DistinctOrderLineList.
Returns the list of Cancellation Reason Codes defined for the provided enterprise
Get Attribute List and allowed combination for a model item
This mashup gets list of variation items for a model item
This mashup is for massaging the input getCompleteOrderDetails so that the same mashup can be used in Create Order and Create Return flows

This mashup is used to massage the input to getCompleteOrderLineList api by updating the OrderHeaderKey from exchange order if exchange order is present in screen input data.This mashup also massages the output of getCompleteOrderLineList api by calling ValidateItemForOrdering api. If there are any orderlines with Errors element present, then Error element is merged into the getCompleteOrderLineList api output OrderLine element.If the order has a bundle item and if bundle components have Error element present, then Error element will be copied into bundle parent Orderline element of getCompleteOrderLineList api output.
This mashup is for massaging the input getCompleteOrderDetails so that the same mashup can be used in Create Order and Create Return flows
Get List of Organizations applicable for current user
Get List of Organizations applicable for current user

This custom mashup is used to perform the following a)calls getCompleteItemList api to fetch variation item details if item is a model item.b)If showInUI rule is enabled for enterprise,calls getCompleteItemList api to get the item's corresponding association types and item details of first association type c)If item is superseded and substitution on order is not allowed then calls getCompleteItemList api to fetch substituted item details
Get List of Document types
Creates an order.
Creates an order.

This mashup is to fetch the YCD_SHIPMENT_OPTIMIZATION_RULE rule details for the enterprise. It gets the code of YCD_SHIPMENT_OPTIMIZATION_RULE rule and calls getAllocationRuleList API to get the rule description.

This mashup is to fetch the YCD_SHIPMENT_OPTIMIZATION_RULE rule details for the enterprise. It gets the code of YCD_SHIPMENT_OPTIMIZATION_RULE rule and calls getAllocationRuleList API to get the rule description.
Get the rule details for selecting the default enterprise shipping preference
Get the allocation rule details of default customer shipping preference
Creates an order.
This mashup is used to delete an Order
This mashup is used to get Return Order for corresponding exchange order which is being deleted. So that, processReturnOrder canbe called on return order after deletion of exchange order.
Update the order with the orderline details.
Update the order with the orderline details.
Creates an order.

This mashup updates availability information for a bundle item based on availability of the bundle components. If bundle components are available then sorts the ship date of all child items and updates parent item with max shipdate.

This mashup massages the output of modifyFulfillmentOptions api by calling ValidationItemForOrdering api and if there are any orderline which have validation errors then sets attribute OrderValidationErrorPresent to true which is read in additems ui to show validation errors.

This mashup massages the output of modifyFulfillmentOptions api by calling ValidationItemForOrdering api and if there are any orderline which have validation errors then sets attribute OrderValidationErrorPresent to true which is read in additems ui to show validation errors.
This mashup is used to validate item for ordering in Fulfillment Summary Page
This mashup is used to validate item for ordering in add items page
This mashup is used to get the complete order details
This mashup is called massage the input of getCompleteOrderDetails.The input of the API is modified to pass the ExchangeOrderKey by parsing through the input.
Gets the complete order details
This mashup is called massage the input of getCompleteOrderDetails.The input of the API is modified to pass the ExchangeOrderKey by parsing through the input.
Gets customer data needed for loading customer preferences screen
Manages customer preference for an order

This mashup is to fetch the rule value of the large order in the runtime. It has the logic to reserve the order in the massageOutput in the SCCSGetLargeOrderRuleValueForReserveOrder based on the no. of orderLines in the order. Since reserve order call needs to be real time , this mashup is not cached even though its a config API call.
Get the fulfillment summary details of an Order
Update the order with the orderline details.
Update the order with the orderline details.

This mashup is used to maintain only one set of instruction text of type GIFT. If any instruction text of type GIFT is coming as an input from the UI, it does two things : a) it creates an instruction element and add an instruction type to each. b) If the GiftFlag for the orderline is coming as N then it deletes all the instruction text of type GIFT stamped on that orderLine.

This custom mashup is used to perform the following a)calls getCompleteItemList api to fetch variation item details if item is a model item.b)If showInUI rule is enabled for enterprise,calls getCompleteItemList api to get the item's corresponding association types and item details of first association type c)If item is superseded and substitution on order is not allowed then calls getCompleteItemList api to fetch Substited item details

This mashup massages the input by forming the query to fetch the component details for the bundleParentLineKey. This mashup massages the output by updating the ExtendedDisplayDescription of bundle parent item when bundle pricing strategy is set to ALL and removes the bundle parent item from the output if bundle pricing strategy is PARENT or COMP.

This mashup is used for doing the following operations in fulfillment summary screen. It takes the orderLine and personInfoShipTo from UI and calls getFulfillmentOptionsForLines API to see if the line is available in the location. If the Line is available then it calls modifyFulfillmentOptions API and saves the data. If the line is unavailable it prepares a list of unavailable lines and passes that to the UI back for further handling.

This mashup is used for doing the following operations in fulfillment summary screen. It takes the orderLine and personInfoShipTo from UI and calls getFulfillmentOptionsForLines API to see if the line is available in the location. If the Line is available then it calls modifyFulfillmentOptions API and saves the data. If the line is unavailable it prepares a list of unavailable lines and passes that to the UI back for further handling.
This mashup is used to get the components for a bundle item.

This mashup modifies the api input to getRuleDetails api by setting the document type and enterprise code by reading exchange order document type and enterprise code when exchange order is present in screen input data.
Get the rule details to display tax exemption

This mashup modifies the api input to getRuleDetails api by setting the document type and enterprise code by reading exchange order document type and enterprise code when exchange order is present in screen input data.
Get the rule details to focus on quantity field.
Get the rule details to find if gift options are enabled with shipment.
Get the rule details to focus on quantity field.
Get the rule details to focus on quantity field.
This mashup is called massage the input of getCompleteOrderDetails.The input of the API is modified to pass the ExchangeOrderKey by parsing through the input.
Get the components of bundle item with complete Order Lines.

This is a mashup which is meant to do two things. a) It selects the list of carrier service which is common to all the Lines which are selected and passed in the input. b) If any line passed in step a. is having parcel shipping option not allowed for the product, then the PARCEL carrier service type is removed from list of carrier service in step a.
Get the fulfillment summary details of an Order
This mashup calls getNoteList to get a list of notes in Order Summary Page
This mashup calls getNoteList to get a list of notes in Order Line Summary Page
Get the item list based on the item id
This mashup massages the output of getCompleteItemList api by fetching the list of association types defined for an item and also fetches the details of items configured for first association type.
This mashup massages the output of getCompleteItemList api by fetching the list of association types defined for an item and also fetches the details of items configured for first association type.
Get the item list based on the item id

This mashup is called to massage the output of getCompleteOrderLineList API called when loading the shipment tracking page. The output is parsed to identify the different statuses of line and based on te values multiple panels are painted in UI.
Gets a list of container detail lines.
Gets the line details needed for line summary page
Gets information needed for bundle component popup
Used to populate the reasons of override popup

This mashup is called while loading the order pricing summary pop up to massage the output of getCompleteOrderDetails. The getChargeCategoryList API is called internally to fetch the charges names of the charges associated with the order and based on the results the UI is populated.

This mashup is called in payment confirmation page while loading the screen. The input is massaged to pass the information of any exchange/return order associated with the order while fetching the results.

This custom mashup extends from the SCCSPrepareOrderNote and is used to fetch the complete order details of return/exchange order on payment confirmation. In the massage output method, after calling getCompleteOrderDetails, currency attribute is added to each promotion element. It groups the promotions under Valid and Invalid. If PaymentMethods is present in the output and if the paymentmethod is CREDIT_CARD, it sets **/**** as the CreditCardExpDate attribute value if date is encrypted. It reads the YCD_USE_CREDIT_CARD_NAME rule value and sets the CreditCardName attribute accordingly.

This mashup is called when saving payment methods for an order. The input and output of the API are modified in this mashup. When calling the API, the input is called to mask secured parameters. The output is then processed to fetch the valid and invalid payment methods and show error accordingly.
Used to match up order payment methods to customer payment methods.

This mahup is called to massage the output of processOrderPayments API called from the payment confirmation page. The mashup internally calls getcompleteOrderDetails and maps the corresponding payments to display success or failures in UI.
This mashup is called for massaging the input of the manageCustomer call to apply the payment method to the contacts if customer is a business customer.
User to recalculate the transfer amounts after changing charges.
Get customer details from the customer list
Gets the shipment details related to a particular shipment
Fetches all shipment lines associated with a shipment

This mashup is called to modify the output of getPaymentInquiryDetails API while loading the payment inquiry screen. The output is massaged to determine the transaction record associated with the order and based on the output the UI is painted.
This mashup is called from payment confirmation/manage awards screen to massage the input to the changeOrder call.
Get the awards associated with the order.
Gets the default value to determine if the question based basic search is displayed
Gets the default value to determine if the question based basic search is displayed
Gets the rule value to fetch the maximum records in the given association type.

If OrderHoldType is present in the input, appropriate Status and StatusQryType, CallingOrganizationCode attributes are added to the OrderHoldType element. Also, if the hold type is ORDER_LINE, then the order line element is added in the OrderHoldType element

This mashup extends SCCSOrderByAPIMashup mashup class and it massages the input to add the appropriate DocumentType to the input. If OrderHoldType is present in the input, appropriate Status and StatusQryType, CallingOrganizationCode attributes are added to the OrderHoldType element. Also, if the hold type is ORDER_LINE, then the order line element is added in the OrderHoldType element

This is a paginated mashup to get list of Customers for Search Criteria
Get customer information from customer id stamped on order
This is a paginated mashup to get List of Customers for Search Criteria
Get the Order Details applicable for the provided order.
Get the details on an invoice.
Get details of the organization to populate shipping invoice
Get list of orders associated with the current order

This mashup is called for massaging the input of fList API. The mashup internally invokes getOrderList API to get the list of all associated orders and based on the output returned, the input is modified to pass the OrderHeaderKey in the input.

This mashup is used to hide the ship together bundle components from the UI. Gift options screen shows ship together bundle parent only and not it's components. getCompleteOrderLineList API is called and then the output is massaged to return all lines minus the ship togther bundle components if any.
Determines if the order line provided can be pricematched.
Determines if the order line provided can be pricematched.
This is a paginated mashup which is used to fetch the price match records to populate the results grid
Get List of Organizations applicable for current user

This mashup calls listOrderLinePriceMatch and fetches OrderLine information for each of the order lines
This mashup calls getCompleteOrderLineList to fetch list of order lines for price match details screen
Screen-PriceMatchDetails,API-getCommonCodeList; Display values for Options binding for 'Status'.
Screen-OrderLinesPriceMatch, API-getOrderLinesForPriceMatch; Order lines to which price match can be applied.
Screen-PriceMatchDetails, API-getCurrencyList; Options binding for currency filtering select.
Screen-PriceMatchDetails,API-getCompleteItemList; Options binding for UOM filtering select
Screen-CreatePriceMatch, API-getCurrencyList; Options binding for Currency filtering select

This mashup is used to modify the output of getCompleteItemList while creating a price match. The UOM and UOM description of the current item is extracted and added to the alternate UOM list to be shown in UI.
Screen-CreatePriceMatch,API-getOrganizationList; Options binding for Enterprise filtering select
Screen-CreatePriceMatch,API-getCommonCodeList; Options Binding for Status filtering select
Screen-CreatePriceMatch, API-getCompetitorList; List of all competitors for competitor filtering select
Screen-CreatePriceMatch, API-managePriceMatch; Save a new price match record
Screen-PriceMatchDetails, API-managePriceMatch; Manage and save a price match record when changes made.

Screen-competitorSearch,API-getCommonCodeList; Calls the 'getCommonCodeList' api to set the display value for the 'Status' field

Screen-CompetitorDetails, API-getCompetitorDetails; Gets the competitor details the selected Competitor Search result.
Screen-CompetitorDetails, API-getCommonCodeList, Get the list of the common codes of the Competitor's status.

Screen-PriceMatchWorksheet, API-getPriceMatchList; Gets the list of price matches for a competitor
Get the order details for cancellation
Get the order details for exchange order

This custom mashup is used to fetch the orderline list. It is commonly used across the application to fetch the orderlines in different scenarios. If the rule YCD_DISPLAY_BUNDLE_COMPONENTS is configured, then the bundle components are also fetch for a bundle item in the order line. If Item element is passed in the input, ItemID attribute is fetched from the input and a complex query is formed in the input in such a way that only those orderlines which contains the item are fetched. The massage output method, gets the LineCharges element from each orderline and if it is present, fetches the ChargePerUnit and ChargePerLine attributes. If these attributes are greater than 0, ChargeAmount and ChargeType attribute is set accordingly
Gets the Default value to determine the available quantity to cancel
Gets the required ueditor input attributes when the screen opening the editor doesn't have the required information.
This mashup is used for massaging the input of changeOrder call invoked from add/modify charges page while modifying charges.
This mashup is used for massaging the input of changeOrder call invoked from add/modify charges page while modifying charges.
Used by the Mashup Data Provider to fetch a Charge Category Description for an Charge Category
Used by the Mashup Data Provider to fetch a Charge Name Description for an Charge Name
Gets the association type for service lines using rule

This mashup modifies the api input to getRuleDetails api by setting the document type and enterprise code by reading exchange order document type and enterprise code when exchange order is present in screen input data.

This mashup calls getCompleteCustomerDetails and gets the customer details and massages the output such that if the customer doesn't have the default currency then the enterprise default currency is used for the customer.
This mashup is called from the resolve holds page for massaging the input to changeOrder API required for resolving the holds associated with the current order or order line.
getCompleteOrderDetails call for fetching the modification types for order holds

This mashup is called while loading the apply holds page to massage the output of getCompleteOrderDetails output. The status modification permissions are checked and based on the value returned, an attribute is set at the order level to determine the modifications.
This mashup is called in apply holds page. The output of getHoldTypeList API is modified to ensure only the hold types valid for the logged in user is displayed in UI.
change header level order for apply holds.
This mashup is called in apply holds page. The output of getHoldTypeList API is modified to ensure only the hold types valid for the logged in user is displayed in UI.
This mashup is called for massaging the input of changeOrder call invoked from apply holds page for associating a hold with the specified order or order line.

This mashup is called while opening the modify charges pop-up. The output of the API is modified to identify the type of charge - ChargePerLine or ChargePerUnit and based on the value returned the corresponding value is populated.
Get the Order Details for Pricing Summary.
Returns the list of Customer Appeasement Reason Codes defined for the provided enterprise

This custom mashup is used to fetch the orderline list. It is commonly used across the application to fetch the orderlines in different scenarios. If the rule YCD_DISPLAY_BUNDLE_COMPONENTS is configured, then the bundle components are also fetch for a bundle item in the order line. If Item element is passed in the input, ItemID attribute is fetched from the input and a complex query is formed in the input in such a way that only those orderlines which contains the item are fetched. The massage output method, gets the LineCharges element from each orderline and if it is present, fetches the ChargePerUnit and ChargePerLine attributes. If these attributes are greater than 0, ChargeAmount and ChargeType attribute is set accordingly
This mashup gets the previous appeasement list by calling getNoteList api and returns the list of notes meeting the filter criteria.
Get the Order Details applicable for the provided order.

This mashup is used to massage the input for getAppeasementOffersUE. To do this it internally invokes customerAppeasement_getCompleteOrderDetails mashup and gets the order details and merges the output of this mashup call with original mashup input. This mashup also filters the output of UE call to return only valid types of appeasement offers.

This mashup is used to massage the input for recordInvoiceCreation api. When the offer is for some percentage value then it calculates the value discount based on the percentage value and stamps it in the input. It also makes all the discount amount as negative before sending the input.
Create the appeasement notes for customer appeasement.

This mashup is used to massage the input for sendFutureOrder UE. It sets some basic attribute for UE call. When the offer is for some percentage value then it calculates the value discount based on the percentage value and stamps it in the input. It also sets the description for offer being given.
Returns the list of currencies
This mashup is called to get a paginated output for orderlines in a order invoice
This mashup is invoked modifyFulfillmentOptions in order to update the lastmodified timestamp on order.This is required for showAll or ShowAddedModfied orderlines feature in addItemtoOrder flow

This mashup is used for doing the following operations in fulfillment summary screen. It takes the orderLine and personInfoShipTo from UI and calls getFulfillmentOptionsForLines API to see if the line is available in the location. If the Line is available then it calls modifyFulfillmentOptions API and saves the data. If the line is unavailable it prepares a list of unavailable lines and passes that to the UI back for further handling.

It takes the orderLine and personInfoShipTo from UI and calls getFulfillmentOptionsForLines API to see if the line is available in the location. If the Line is available then it calls modifyFulfillmentOptions API and saves the data. If the line is unavailable it prepares a list of unavailable lines and passes that to the UI back for further handling.

This mashup is called while opening the delivery charges popup from the work order appt screen.The output of this API is used to populate the line charge associated with the work order.
This mahup is called in work order appointment screen to get the list of all work orders which does not have an appointment saved or skipped.

This mashup is used to get complete customer details

This mashup is used to get order line details of only bundle parent

This mashup is used for massaging the input and output of the getCompleteOrderLineList API call while creating a return. The API internally calls getRuleDetails API to determine the rule value of the rule YCD_SHOW_RESHIP_ON_RETURN_ENTRY and based on the results forms the input. Once the API goes through, we parse through the output to find any lines which violates the return policy and shown them as error panels.

This is a paginated mashup is used for massaging the input to the getOrderList API while fetching the order lines associated with the current sales order. The mashup internally calls createReturn_getShipmentContainerList API to fetch the list of containers associated with the shipment and forms a complex query with the returned results to fetch all the lines associated.
